technical_challenges.title: Build & Evaluate a Baseline Model
technical_challenges.prompt: Given a small CSV with features and a target, train a baseline model, report metrics, and discuss error analysis.

bias_mitigation_protocol: Evaluate using rubric only; ignore names, photos, demographics.
Blind review: hide personal identifiers in submissions.
Double-score borderline submissions with a second reviewer.
Use structured feedback template with evidence-based comments.
